name: Dark mode for quizlet.com (v1.3)
description:
It's finally here! No need to pay membership for a dark mode when you can get this.

Also all of my themes are Public Domain which means you can take it and you don't need my permission. If I become inactive, you can continue the project without worrying about legal issues.

user.name: Fighter169mobile
user.about:
I usually make dark modes here.

If anything on my dark styles is missing, send me a message. (preferably by email)

additional_info:
Future updates:
- Fixing any issues as they come up.
- Style settings to be added.

All times in CST
v1.3 - 9:53 PM September 3, 2019
- Many fixes from new website changes.

v1.2.4 - 4:20 PM June 13, 2019
- Fixed some incorrectly colored text/icons and fixed a few new website changes.

v1.2.3 - 6:40 AM June 6, 2019
- Updated Quizlet style on the new flashcard page.

v1.2.2 - 6:05 PM May. 7, 2019
- Style updated for the new Quizlet style. This includes a fix with an extra grey area appearing when hovering over the sidebar buttons with a notification, premium content splash page fix and a few more minor fixes.
- One of the fixes on the new Quizlet theme changed the order of the background color css.
- Notification button color tweak to appear better with the theme.
- Updated screenshot because Recent Tab has a new look on the website. New screenshot located on Folders tab.

v1.2.1 - 7:39 AM Apr. 16, 2019
- More "For You" fixes.
- Support for https://quizlet.com/checkout/invoice
- Many more fixes.
- Mobile support is now being tested on mobile! Expect mobile to get even better in the upcoming days.

v1.2 - 3:46 PM Mar. 22, 2019 (current update)
- Updated style for the new "For You" section
- A few bug fixes.

v1.1.2 - 6:32 PM Mar. 5, 2019
- Darkened buttons from v1.1.1 were causing too many issues.. no more darkened icon buttons for now.
- More purple buttons to a few buttons that aren't supposed to be white :)
- Removed outdated code with extra text added to the upgrades menu.
- Warning buttons are more red when hovered over for improved readability.

v1.1.1 - 6:04 PM Feb. 28, 2019
- Updated the style to fit with website changes.
- Some icon buttons were darkened.

v1.1 - 7:06 PM CST Feb. 19, 2019 - Fixed a great amount of issues such as:
- Small website change with invisible shadows are now invisible in the dark mode from quizlet.com/updates
- Fixed text color on crossed out "$1.xx/month"
- quizlet.com/checkout, quizlet.com/features/live, Teacher-exclusive pages and Quizlet Live are now supported including the Student view of Quizlet Live.
- Auto-suggested boxes are now dark.
- All Premium pages (before paying money) should be dark now.
- DMCA Copyright Complaint page is supported.
- Some things before the page loaded weren't dark.. now they're all dark!
- Other small fixes.

v1 - First public update! 10:23 PM Feb. 14, 2019
